arts.ttl: How Mbeumo, Yoro could help Man United overcome shaky Liverpool at Anfield
arts.sum: Manchester United duo Bryan Mbeumo and Leny Yoro could be vital to their side's chances of claiming a famous win over Liverpool at Anfield on Sunday afternoon.

arts.sum: Ruben Amorim remains under pressure at Manchester United ahead of the Red Devils' trip to Liverpool

arts.ttl: 'Next Ryan Giggs' who joined Liverpool from Man Utd now makes £15m a year after quitting football
arts.sum: The talented forward had the world at his feet but a cruel injury blow saw him walk away from football for good

arts.ttl: Liverpool Predicted Lineup vs. Man Utd: Isak, Wirtz Aiming for Redemption at Anfield
arts.sum: Liverpool are eager to stop the rot after three successive defeats.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Predicted Lineup vs. Liverpool: Cunha Returns to Form Fabulous Front Three
arts.sum: Manchester United are searching for a first win at Anfield in almost a decade.

arts.ttl: Man United aiming to break 118-year record in Liverpool battle at Anfield
arts.sum: Manchester United will be looking to break a 118-year record when they take on Liverpool at Anfield in the Premier League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Twenty is plenty: Salah can join Kane, Rooney in exclusive club against Man Utd
arts.sum: Liverpool's Mohamed Salah can join the likes of Wayne Rooney and Harry Kane in an exclusive Premier League club when the Reds host Manchester United on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Liverpool boss Arne Slot's warning to Man Utd star he branded 'arrogant' in clear comments
arts.sum: The current Manchester United star was previously warned by Slot about his causal nature on the pitch

arts.ttl: Insistence Manchester United player unfazed by pressure – Set to start against Liverpool
arts.sum: On Sunday, Manchester United take on Liverpool in the Premier League at Anfield. Ahead of this big clash, Saturday’s edition of Het Belang van Limburg has a report on Manchester United goalkeeper Senne Lammens. The 23-year-old joined the Red Devils from Royal Antwerp on summer deadline day.
